results.title: Sky pirates
results.creator_credit: C M Pennington-Richards, Frank Godwin and Ansus Films
results.brief_description: When their model plane crashes at the Aero Club, Mike and Harry are befriended by ex-pilot, Charlie Bradford, and his niece, Maggie, who teach them to fly radio controlled planes. Charlie invites them to the test flight of his new long distance aircraft which is later stolen. When they learn that a diamond has been stolen from the French State Museum, they realise the plane is to be used to smuggle the diamond out of the country.
results.creator_credit_for_label: C M Pennington-Richards, Frank Godwin and Ansus Films
results.description: When their model plane crashes at the Aero Club, Mike and Harry are befriended by ex-pilot, Charlie Bradford, and his niece, Maggie, who teach them to fly radio controlled planes. When they learn that a diamond has been stolen from the French State Museum, they realise the plane is to be used to smuggle the diamond out of the country.

Charlie invites them to the test flight of his new long distance aircraft which is later stolen. When they learn that a diamond has been stolen from the French State Museum, they realise the plane is to be used to smuggle the diamond out of the country.

results.title: Life story
results.creator_credit: Joel Atkinson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Joel Atkinson’s parents split up, his dad took him to Shepparton. Determined to make the most of it, Atkinson worked hard to be a good role model for his siblings.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Joel Atkinson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Cousins
results.creator_credit: Helen Atkinson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Helen Atkinson believes that family should always be close so you have someone to turn to when you need them the most. She shares a close bond with her cousin and wouldn’t have it any other way.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Helen Atkinson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Always thinking of home
results.creator_credit: Troy Lovett, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Troy Lovett’s parents divorced, he moved to Heywood which had a great Koorie population and was a great place to grow up. Lovett has since moved to Shepparton and, while he doesn’t miss the small town itself, there is a lot he misses about it.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Troy Lovett, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: To my dearest son Mileak
results.creator_credit: Natasha Craig, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Even though Natasha Craig was pregnant at age 15, she was determined to have her child and embrace her new life as a mother. With the support of her family, she has been able to do so and doesn’t regret her decision as she sets up her life for her and her son.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Natasha Craig, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Even though Natasha Craig was pregnant at age 15, she was determined to have her child and embrace her new life as a mother. With the support of her family, she has been able to do so and doesn’t regret her decision as she sets up her life for her and her son.

results.title: Sky
results.creator_credit: John Feeney, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: From the height of the Rockies on the rim of the western plains, the film catches and condenses the astounding spectacle of a day in the life of the sky. Photographed with many kinds of lenses and at different camera speeds, the result is a cinematographic experience of rare beauty - every changing mood of the sky is vividly registered. Film without words.
results.creator_credit_for_label: John Feeney, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
results.description: From the height of the Rockies on the rim of the western plains, the film catches and condenses the astounding spectacle of a day in the life of the sky. Film without words.
